name: F1 World Grand Prix
overview: Schumaker, Hakkinen, Coulthard. Compete with or against the best drivers in the most hi-tech racing series in the world. Featuring all the teams, drivers and circuits from the 2000 FIA Formula One World Championship season, F1 World Grand Prix 2000 puts you behind the wheel in the competition for the 2000 FIA Formula One Driver's Championship title.
